___shutdownCheckDelay.description: Initial delay before checking for shutdown

___providerTimeoutMs.description: Kill the stream if all providers supply nothing for this long.

___shutdownCheckInterval.description: Recurring delay between checking for shutdown

___providerWaitMs.description: Wait this long before beginning polling providers.

___startedAt.description: Timestamp of beginning of stream execution

___batchSize.description: Default max batch size for batch-based persist readers and writers
